channel.title: Industrial · Workplace Safety on CIP Reporting

item.title: International Logistic Company
item.description: Empowering the Shift: From Manual Claims Processing to Focusing on Risk Mitigation and Prevention As a third-party logistics provider, moving goods around the globe involves inherent risks, to employees who are handling the products, risks to customers should anything happen to those products in transit, and risks to the company’s property. It is therefore critical to have a robust system for reporting, documenting, and tracking near misses, incidents, and claims wherever they occur in the world.
